## Classes

### <a name="simp_authselect"></a>`simp_authselect`

TODO: Summary describing the SIMP class 'simp_authselect'

#### Examples

##### Basic usage

```puppet
include  'simp_authselect'
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `simp_authselect` class:

* [`custom_profile_name`](#-simp_authselect--custom_profile_name)
* [`base_profile`](#-simp_authselect--base_profile)
* [`authselect_sections`](#-simp_authselect--authselect_sections)
* [`use_authselect`](#-simp_authselect--use_authselect)

##### <a name="-simp_authselect--custom_profile_name"></a>`custom_profile_name`

Data type: `String`

String that must be provided in order to create a custom profile

Default value: `'simp'`

##### <a name="-simp_authselect--base_profile"></a>`base_profile`

Data type:

```puppet
Enum[
    'sssd',
    'winbind',
    'nis',
    'minimal'
  ]
```

Must be one of the enumerated values

Default value: `'sssd'`

##### <a name="-simp_authselect--authselect_sections"></a>`authselect_sections`

Data type: `Array[String]`

An array that allows you to pass in any Pam::auth_sections for configuring the authselect
class

Default value: `['fingerprint', 'password', 'smartcard', 'system']`

##### <a name="-simp_authselect--use_authselect"></a>`use_authselect`

Data type: `Boolean`

Boolean set to simp_options::authselect, must be true to utilize the class

Default value: `simplib::lookup('simp_options::authselect', { 'default_value' => false })`
